ABOUT

Cascadia Public House is a locally owned and operated Northwest Gastropub. We focus on highlighting local farmers and ingredients with an emphasis on sustainability for the future. Our menu features Burgers, Sandwiches, Salads, Seafood, Gluten-free options, and over 15 dedicated Plant Based dishes! We are located at 6314 N. Ash St (509-321-7051). See you soon!

ABOUT

Cascadia Public House is a locally owned and operated Northwest Gastropub. We focus on highlighting local farmers and ingredients with an emphasis on sustainability for the future. Our menu features Burgers, Sandwiches, Salads, Seafood, Gluten-free options, and over 15 dedicated Plant Based dishes! We are located at 6314 N. Ash St (509-321-7051). See you soon!
